Description: Offered for your consideration from my personal collection is this 1998 DeArmond by Guild (which, as you probably know, Guild is owned by Fender Musical Instrument Corporation) with the original hard-shell case. (Note: Although the length and width of the guitar are substantially the same as that of a Les Paul, with the DeArmond Bigsby a/k/a “Digsby”, the standard Gibson case is not deep enough so having the OHSC is important.) The guitar is in outstanding condition. Frets are in great condition. There have been several upgrades made to the guitar: TV Jones pickups, Schlerter tuning machines, Stew-Mac roller bridge, USA wiring with treble bleed on bridge pickup, Tusq XL nut, and satin neck for fast playing. All work done by a professional guitar tech. Here are more details: Body: Translucent dark walnut stained Agathis Top: Maple with Champaign Sparkle finish with cream binding Neck: Set maple Fretboard: Rosewood with cream binding and pearloid block inlays Scale length: 24.625” (Same as Gretsch) Radius: 12” Frets: 22 Nut: Graph Tec Tusq XL Width at nut: 1.6875” Thickness at 1st fret: 0.82” Thickness at 12th fret: 0.88” Tuners: Schlerter 18:1 ratio open back Tremolo: Bigsby style Neck pickup: TV Jones T-Armond Bridge pickup: TV Jones Classic Controls: 2 volume, 2 tone, 1 three-way switch Pots: CTS Switch: Switchcraft Strings: Elixir Nanoweb 11-49 Weight: 8.2 pounds RETURN POLICY: I HAVE BEEN SELLING ON EBAY FOR 20 YEARS AND HAVE MAINTAINED A 100% FEEDBACK. I WANT TO KEEP IT THIS WAY SO IF FOR ANY REASON YOU ARE NOT HAPPY WITH YOUR PURCHASE YOU MAY RETURN IT WITHIN 14 DAYS FOR A FULL REFUND OF THE PURCHASE PRICE, INCLUDING SHIPPING. THE ITEM MUST BE RETURNED IN THE SAME CONDITION AS IT WAS SHIPPED. BUYER PAYS RETURN SHIPPING COSTS. SHIPPING: CONUS, ONLY. NO INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING.
Title: 1998 DEARMOND BY GUILD M75T ELECTRIC GUITAR WITH TV JONES, OHSC & MORE!
